title: Audio
description: Audio data used for audio emitters. Audio can be referenced by URI or `bufferView` index. `mimeType` is required.

uri.gltf_detailedDescription: The uri of the audio. Relative paths are relative to the .gltf file.

mimeType.description: The audio's MIME type. Used to determine if the client supports the given audio.

bufferView.description: The index of the bufferView that contains the audio data. Use this instead of the image's uri property.
